title: [Large-Scale] Active Learning Strategy Development Workshop for Healthcare Professional Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of healthcare professional education and general knowledge of learning theories/methodologies
context.additional_context: A process exploring the application of active learning approaches for medical professionals, focusing on designing practical activities and fostering a peer feedback culture in limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Design three or more active learning activities applicable in medical education settings
Analyze survey results to derive two or more key barriers that can inform instructional design
Propose improvements to active learning strategies through collaborative learning with peer educators

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
